Webcam: 1.3 megapixels, Processor: 1.66GHz Intel Atom N450 667MHz, Cache: 512KB L2
Memory: 1GB DDR2 SDRAM, Hard drive: 160GB SATA, Graphics: Intel Graphics Media Accelerator 3150 with 64MB, Networking: Ethernet, wi-fi 802.11b/g/n
